title: Mourning in Gaza and snow in Seaham: photos of the day – Thursday
text:
Mourning in Gaza and snow in Seaham: photos of the day – Thursday

The Guardian’s picture editors select photographs from around the world

Palestinian boys walk amid the debris of a damaged building belonging to the ministry of religious endowments a day after it was targeted by the Israeli army. Photograph: Omar Al-Qattaa/AFP/Getty Images
